snippet: The sample size is small, but the Mets have faced 15 left-handed starters in 31 games this season. Are teams trying to manipulate their pitching rotations to have lefties face the Mets' lefty-heavy lineup?
abstract: The sample size is small, but the Mets have faced 15 left-handed starters in 31 games this season. Are teams trying to manipulate their pitching rotations to have lefties face the Mets' lefty-heavy lineup?

headline.main: Mets Have Faced Parade of Lefties
